description: "This map of Asia, from an atlas by the German cartographer Karl von Spruner, is colour-coded to show the colonial possessions of the European powers—Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, France, Britain and Denmark—at the start of the 17th century."
title: "Asien   am   Angange   des   XVIIten   Jahrhunderts   (Asia   at   the   beginning   of   the   17th   century)"
